metadata.Title: CVE-2016-2559 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the format function in libraries/sql-parser/src/Utils/Error.php in the SQL parser in phpMyAdmin 4.5.x before 4.5.5.1 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via a crafted query.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.6.0-2').
